attributes.action: We should offer to send 250,000 doses of the Covid vaccine to Australia.
attributes.additional_details: In this new post-Brexit world this is a very good opportunity to re-establish old friendships.
attributes.background: We can easily afford to send 250,000 doses of the vaccine to another Commonwealth country. Most of our vulnerable people are already protected. We should do so immediately.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Prioritise providing excess vaccines to Commonwealth countries: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572960

Once priority groups in the UK are vaccinated redirect Covid-19 vaccines abroad: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572802
